title: Crash
body: Game crashes after I click on icon. Loads the logo then crashes. Says that pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working. What is going on?

replies.body: The patcher is trying to load in this case, but something is blocking it from happening.  Usually it's an OS or security setting, and I suggest using our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed and restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
